snippet.title: Battletoads / Double Dragon - NES Gameplay
snippet.description:
The original NES gameplay archive, est 2007 includes gameplay captures from all commercial releases from the US market with a few extras (like famicom releases) just for fun. 

As of Dec 2024, I've resumed efforts to update some of the older (some 360p) videos with higher-def captures. Some of these efforts are being streamed on Twitch, and text updates will be posted to BlueSky (which doesn't require an account to view). Please follow these if you're interested!

https://bsky.app/profile/nesguide.com
https://www.twitch.tv/nesguide
